verbs.description: gelatinate (third-person singular simple present gelatinates, present participle gelatinating, simple past and past participle gelatinated)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To convert into gelatin or a jelly-like substance.
(intransitive) To be converted into gelatin or a jelly-like substance.
examples: Lapis lazuli, if calcined, does not effervesce, but gelatinates with the mineral acids.
